about_the_game: This is a hint book for Peter's Adventures in English. It does not include the original game. This book will help you solve the most difficult puzzles. It's in English with helpful pictures. Purchasing this DLC is a great way to support the developers of Peter's Adventures in English.
detailed_description: This is a hint book for Peter's Adventures in English. It does not include the original game. This book will help you solve the most difficult puzzles. It's in English with helpful pictures. Purchasing this DLC is a great way to support the developers of Peter's Adventures in English.
